markdown:
# Workflow procedures 2024-12-24 21:43 This topic introduces the whole process that developers must go through to release a mini program. ## Apply for an Account Before developing a Mini Program, you need to create a developer account, which allows you to create, develop or publish your Mini Program. ![image.png](https://idocs-assets.marmot-cloud.com/storage/idocs87c36dc8dac653c1/1615797895591-2804d87e-acde-499f-aa02-d47c9432e0a8.png) Fill in the information, then you can finish the account creation process. Ask the workspace admin to the role for you: Workspace DeveloperÔºåWorkspace Admin or Workspace Reviewer. Note that developer can develop the Mini Program, and only the Mini Program admin can create and publish the Mini Program. ## Logging in After completing the registration, log in directly at the login entry on the homepage of the Mini Program Platform. ![image.png](https://idocs-assets.marmot-cloud.com/storage/idocs87c36dc8dac653c1/1623744296421-a9973978-0671-4586-b89f-a2d66beea0c6.png) ## Create a Tenant Workspace Register a Workspace in Mini Program Development Platform (MPDP) ### Step 1 Provide the information of your organization Please provide the following information and send us email. - Workspace Name - Scope of Business (Please find the attachment[üìéMCC\_20190701.xlsx](https://idocs-assets.marmot-cloud.com/storage/idocs87c36dc8dac653c1/yuque/attachments/yuque/0/2021/xlsx/561635/1623812073916-802038d8-1785-4145-89ad-f153948e2805.xlsx), and send us the code) - Business Address - Business Representative Name & Contact Email (You can provide more than one. He/She will become the primary workspace admin of the platform) ### Step 2 Be patient It will take us 5 business days to generate a workspace and customized Mini Program Studio. Please be patient and reach us if you have any question. ### Step 3 Your Tenant Workspace is generated We will send you back a confirmation email with workspace account information once the workspace is generated. ## Invite members and set roles Give members controlled access to your Workspace You can invite other members ¬†to access your workspace. To protect your sensitive information or restrict the actions they can perform, user roles limit their access. Each member must be assigned a role(In tenant space, you can set the user to be Workspace adminÔºåWorkspace reviewerÔºåWorkspace Developer) when they are added. Team members and user roles are managed in your workspace "Members" settings page. You can add new members individually, or invite multiple users at the same time. The "Members: settings page only allowed for workspace admin to view and manage. ![image.png](https://idocs-assets.marmot-cloud.com/storage/idocs87c36dc8dac653c1/1733123115667-90092516-ac8c-4c1b-8e11-8be13df91247.png) ## Workspace ### Workspace - General ![image.png](https://idocs-assets.marmot-cloud.com/storage/idocs87c36dc8dac653c1/1733123140457-128c2d02-f512-4fbf-aa64-de13899ab58e.png) Path: ¬†Workspace Manage | | | | --- | --- | | **Role** | **Authorization** | | Workspace Admin | ÔºçAble to view the workspace informations. | When you first created a Workspace by providing your company‚Äôs info., our team would generate a workspace with listing all the info. you have provided on the Workspace - general tab | | | | --- | --- | | **Field** | **Description** | | Workspace ID | Generated by Platform. | | Workspace Name | Rule of naming:
\- You can‚Äôt change the name after workspace is generated
\- Character combination A-Z, a-z, 0-9
\- No space
\- Will be used as URL | | Status | | | Business Address | | | Scope of Business | Select from the attachment.
[üìéMCC\_20190701.xlsx](https://idocs-assets.marmot-cloud.com/storage/idocs87c36dc8dac653c1/yuque/attachments/yuque/0/2021/xlsx/561635/1623812074540-647fee75-6a41-4b8c-8a62-2b6ac0f371c1.xlsx) | | Business Representative | The business representative will be the Workspace Admin as well. | | Representative email | | -You can contact us to request for information change. ## App Manage ![image.png](https://idocs-assets.marmot-cloud.com/storage/idocs87c36dc8dac653c1/1733123162801-da865eda-b0cb-4abf-ab4e-9be574a5a836.png) Path: ¬†App Manage - App detail | | | | --- | --- | | **Role** | **Authorization** | | Workspace Admin | ÔºçAble to add/view App infornation. | | | | | --- | --- | | **Field** | **Description** | | Mini Program Accessing Key | Mini Program Accessing Key:
An unique key allowing container SDKs to access Mini Program data through SaaS. | | Mini Program Upload Key | Mini Program Upload Key:
\- An unique key allowing Mini Program Bundles to build and upload to the Console.
\- Container verification.
When you are ready to publish your mini program, you need to sign yourCopy mini program and upload it to a workspace portal. | ## Members For more information, see [Workspace member roles](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/member-role). Path: Workspace - Members | | | | --- | --- | | **Role** | **Authorization** | | Workspace Admin | ÔºçAble to add/view the member(s).
ÔºçAble to set member(s) as other roles. | | | | | --- | --- | | **Field** | **Description** | | Member's login email | User's registered email. | | Username | | | Role | Workspace roles:

html:
Workflow procedures

2024-12-24 21:43

This topic introduces the whole process that developers must go through to release a mini program.

Apply for an Account

Before developing a Mini Program, you need to create a developer account, which allows you to create, develop or publish your Mini Program.

Fill in the information, then you can finish the account creation process.

Ask the workspace admin to the role for you: Workspace DeveloperÔºåWorkspace Admin or Workspace Reviewer. Note that developer can develop the Mini Program, and only the Mini Program admin can create and publish the Mini Program.

Logging in

After completing the registration, log in directly at the login entry on the homepage of the Mini Program Platform.

Create a Tenant Workspace

Register a Workspace in Mini Program Development Platform (MPDP)

Step 1 Provide the information of your organization

Please provide the following information and send us email.

  • Workspace Name
  • Scope of Business (Please find the attachmentüìéMCC_20190701.xlsx, and send us the code)
  • Business Address
  • Business Representative Name & Contact Email (You can provide more than one. He/She will become the primary workspace admin of the platform)

Step 2 Be patient

It will take us 5 business days to generate a workspace and customized Mini Program Studio. Please be patient and reach us if you have any question.

Step 3 Your Tenant Workspace is generated

We will send you back a confirmation email with workspace account information once the workspace is generated.

Invite members and set roles

Give members controlled access to your Workspace

You can invite other members  to access your workspace. To protect your sensitive information or restrict the actions they can perform, user roles limit their access. Each member must be assigned a role(In tenant space, you can set the user to be Workspace adminÔºåWorkspace reviewerÔºåWorkspace Developer) when they are added.

Team members and user roles are managed in your workspace "Members" settings page. You can add new members individually, or invite multiple users at the same time.

The "Members: settings page only allowed for workspace admin to view and manage.

Workspace

Workspace - General

Path:  Workspace Manage

Role

Authorization

Workspace Admin

ÔºçAble to view the workspace informations.

When you first created a Workspace by providing your company‚Äôs info., our team would generate a workspace with listing all the info. you have provided on the Workspace - general tab

- You can‚Äôt change the name after workspace is generated

- Character combination A-Z, a-z, 0-9

- No space

- Will be used as URL

Select from the attachment.
üìéMCC_20190701.xlsx

Business Representative

The business representative will be the Workspace Admin as well.

Representative email

-You can contact us to request for information change.

App Manage

Path:  App Manage - App detail

Role

Authorization

Workspace Admin

ÔºçAble to add/view App infornation.

Field

Description

Mini Program Accessing Key

Mini Program Accessing Key:

An unique key allowing container SDKs to access Mini Program data through SaaS.

Mini Program Upload Key

Mini Program Upload Key:

- An unique key allowing Mini Program Bundles to build and upload to the Console.

- Container verification.

When you are ready to publish your mini program, you need to sign yourCopy mini program and upload it to a workspace portal.

Members

For more information, see Workspace member roles.

Role

Authorization

ÔºçAble to set member(s) as other roles.

Workspace AdminÔºõ

Member StatusÔºö

1ÔºéActiveÔºõcorresponding action: block.

2ÔºéInactiveÔºõcorresponding action: unblock.

ÔºçEven the user got blocked, he/she could still log into the console. But the user would not able to access to the workspace and mini program on the console and Mini Program Studio.

Are you sure you want to unblock the member?
